!Sentinel Kendell: Young friend, why have you not left yet? We must spare no time in defeating the kaboo orcs that invade our beautiful woods! The orders I have given you list which orc leaders you must slay and where their locations are. Slay the targets and bring back *proof* of their deaths. As your opponent is an orc leader, take extra caution. Well, go on now. May the blessings of Eva be with you.
